I am pleased to inform you that I am organizing a special issue on “Distributed Ledger Technologies and Artificial Intelligence” at the International Journal of Wef Information Systems, together with Dr. Oscar Carlos Medina (Universidad TecnolÃ³gica Nacional â€“ Facultad Regional CÃ³rdoba, Argentina) and Dr. Ana Isabel Azevedo (, CEOS.PP/ ISCAP/ Polytechnic of Porto, Portugal).

The deadline for paper submission is September 30

For more information, please visit the conference website https://www.emeraldgrouppublishing.com/calls-for-papers/special-issue-distributed-ledger-technologies-and-artificial-intelligence.
